response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and highly valuable product. This item holds immense significance to me, but I am confident it could also bring unparalleled benefits to someone like yourself. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $750,000, which I believe is an exceptional value considering its true worth. I look forward to discussing the details and understanding how this product might fit into your life or business. Let's make this a win-win situation for both parties. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 750000}
